ARE YOUR KIDS READY TO CHANGE THE WORLD?

 

Future astronaut in the household? Creative inventor in the family? Eager to invent new technologies, solve problems and make a difference?

Boost STEM skills today with a new JIMU Robot kit. Take the journey to the next level and encourage your kids to develop the tools to lead the next technological revolution – robotics.

excerpt.rendered: BUILD. CODE. PLAY. BUILDING JIMU ROBOTS BUILDS CONFIDENCE IN KIDS   JIMU Robot kits make the entire process easy on parents and kids No extra tools required Rechargeable battery included Countless ways to upgrade or customize your robotic creations for continuous play and inventing LEARN TO PROGRAM WITH A SIMPLE DRAG AND DROP […]
